desc.d1: - Rheem Cooling is a specialist Air Conditioner retail store. Founded in 1998, Rheem Cooling brings under one roof, multi-brand air conditioning products.
desc.d2: - We have over 20 brands in more than 40 stores across.
desc.d3: - Rheem Cooling brings alive the promise of a ‘Brighter Every Day’ with a world-class ambience to shop both in-store and online, while also creating a seamless omnichannel shopping experience that lets you enjoy the best of both, online and offline worlds.
desc.d4: - You’ll always be spoilt for choice at Rheem Cooling but will never be left confused. Experts at our stores will help you find the right Air Conditioner for your needs.
